unnormalised: ## Flash Sales: Blink and You'll Miss That Lehenga, Yaar!
normalised: ## Flash Sales: Blink and You'll Miss That Lehenga, Yaar!

unnormalised: Okay, folks, let's talk about flash sales. It's the online equivalent of trying to catch a runaway ladoo at a Diwali party – chaotic, thrilling, and potentially messy. One minute, you're scrolling through Instagram, admiring Priyanka Chopra's latest outfit, and the next, BAM! "FLASH SALE! 70% OFF on Designer Sarees for the next 3 hours!"
normalised: Okay, folks, let's talk about flash sales. It's the online equivalent of trying to catch a runaway ladoo at a Diwali party – chaotic, thrilling, and potentially messy. One minute, you're scrolling through Instagram, admiring Priyanka Chopra's latest outfit, and the next, B A M! "FLASH SALE! seventy percent off on Designer Sarees for the next three hours!"

unnormalised: Suddenly, you're battling your Auntie Rajni for the last Kanjeevaram silk saree in your size. And Auntie Rajni doesn't play fair, let me tell you. She's a pro at this game. She's been prepping for this moment since the last Flipkart Big Billion Day sale.
normalised: Suddenly, you're battling your Auntie Rajni for the last Kanjeevaram silk saree in your size. And Auntie Rajni doesn't play fair, let me tell you. She's a pro at this game. She's been prepping for this moment since the last Flipkart Big Billion Day sale.

unnormalised: Seriously though, flash sales are like a Bollywood plot twist. You think you're just chilling, maybe sipping some chai, and then BOOM! High drama! Limited stock! A ticking clock! You're sweating more than you would after a 5 km run in the Delhi heat.
normalised: Seriously though, flash sales are like a Bollywood plot twist. You think you're just chilling, maybe sipping some chai, and then B O O M! High drama! Limited stock! A ticking clock! You're sweating more than you would after a five kilometer run in the Delhi heat.

unnormalised: The pressure is ON. You frantically add that gorgeous Anarkali suit you've been eyeing for months to your cart, only to discover that someone in Nagpur (probably Auntie Rajni's cousin) already snagged it. The frustration is real!
normalised: The pressure is O N. You frantically add that gorgeous Anarkali suit you've been eyeing for months to your cart, only to discover that someone in Nagpur (probably Auntie Rajni's cousin) already snagged it. The frustration is real!

unnormalised: But hey, when you DO manage to score that perfect kurta for your cousin's wedding at 80% off, it's a victory on par with India winning the Cricket World Cup! You brag about it to all your friends and family, even Dr. Sharma from next door, who clearly has no interest but politely nods along anyway.
normalised: But hey, when you D O manage to score that perfect kurta for your cousin's wedding at eighty percent off, it's a victory on par with India winning the Cricket World Cup! You brag about it to all your friends and family, even Doctor Sharma from next door, who clearly has no interest but politely nods along anyway.

unnormalised: Just remember: set an alarm, have your payment details ready, and maybe do some yoga beforehand to control your stress levels. Think of it as a marathon, not a sprint. Okay, maybe a really, REALLY short sprint, like 100 meters in a tiny 500 sq ft Mumbai apartment.
normalised: Just remember: set an alarm, have your payment details ready, and maybe do some yoga beforehand to control your stress levels. Think of it as a marathon, not a sprint. Okay, maybe a really, R E A L L Y short sprint, like one hundred meters in a tiny five hundred square feet Mumbai apartment.

unnormalised: And if you miss out? Don't worry, there's always another flash sale around the corner. Just keep those notifications ON. Good luck, and may the odds be ever in your favor, because believe me, you'll need it! Remember to calculate the Rs. before adding to your cart!
normalised: And if you miss out? Don't worry, there's always another flash sale around the corner. Just keep those notifications O N. Good luck, and may the odds be ever in your favor, because believe me, you'll need it! Remember to calculate the rupees before adding to your cart!
